快啲成為Lovelinus既一份子啦










現在，我們終於得到一位了









Lovelyz（韓語：러블리즈）是Woollim Entertainment於2014年11月12日推出的八人女子團體，由Baby Soul、智愛、智秀、美珠、Kei、JIN、洙正、叡仁八名成員組成，11月12日以《Candy Jelly Love》正式出道、11月17日發行正規一輯《Girls' Invasion》。

2015年3月3日，發行正規一輯改版專輯《Hi~ (안녕)》。8月27日，Lovelyz公布以八人狀態回歸，官方公開先行曲《Shooting star (작별하나)》，10月1日，公開專輯音源及主打歌《Ah-Choo》MV。12月7日，發佈後續曲音源及主打歌《For You (그대에게)》MV。

2016年4月25日，公開專輯音源及主打歌《Destiny (나의 지구)》MV及舉辦第二張迷你專輯《A New Trilogy》發行紀念Showcase。

2017年1月13-15日，舉辦首場單獨演唱會《冬之國度的Lovelyz》。2月26日，公開第二張正規專輯《R U Ready?》音源及主打歌《WoW!》。5月2日，發行正規二輯改版專輯《Now, We(지금, 우리)》。5月16日，於THE SHOW拿下生涯初一位。7月29-30日，舉辦2017 Lovelyz Concert《Alwayz》。8月5-6日，在日本東京舉辦首場海外演唱會2017 Lovelyz Concert《Alwayz》in Japan。11月14日，攜帶迷你三輯《Fall in Lovelyz》及主打歌《Twinkle (종소리)》再度回歸。12月9日，在台北舉辦《2017 Lovelyz 1st Showcase in Taiwan》。

2018年2月2-4日，舉辦《冬之國度的Lovelyz 2》。2月10日及12日，於日本東京及大阪舉辦《LOVELYZ CONCERT IN JAPAN – LOVELYZ 2 OF WINTER WORLD》。4月23日，以第四張迷你專輯《治癒》及主打歌《那天的你 (그날의 너)》回歸。 6月16日，在香港舉辦《 2018 ASIA FAN MEETING LOVELYZ [THE FAN] IN HONG KONG》。7月1日，發布特別數位單曲專輯《夏日的碎片》及主打歌《Wag-zak (여름 한 조각)》回歸。7月28-29日，舉辦粉絲見面會《LOVELY DAY 2》。8月18日，於日本千葉舉辦《LOVELYZ 2018 Fan Meeting
in JAPAN》。9月10日，推出樂器伴奏專輯《Muse on Music》。11月26日，推出第五張迷你專輯《SANCTUARY》及主打歌《Lost N Found (찾아가세요)》回歸。

2019年2月14-17日，舉辦《冬之國度的Lovelyz 3》，並宣佈以首爾站為起點之亞洲巡迴演唱會；3月17日，於第二站新加坡舉辦《LOVELYZ CONCERT IN SINGAPORE – LOVELYZ 3 OF WINTER WORLD》；3月24日，於第三站香港舉辦《LOVELYZ CONCERT IN HONG KONG – LOVELYZ 3 OF WINTER WORLD》；3月31日，以最後一站台灣之《LOVELYZ CONCERT IN TAIPEI – LOVELYZ 3 OF WINTER WORLD》圓滿結束亞洲巡迴演唱會。

官方粉絲名為「Lovelinus」（러블리너스）

replies.msg: 閪手

I saw Lovelyz live at Saitama Super Arena which was absolutely incredible and unforgettable. They've been strutting their stuff since they were children so don't sell them short. At the end of the last encore they bowed onstage soaking up the applause. They received a thunderous standing ovation. On top of being an incredible musician the lead singer is also an avid runner. She took part in a three thousand metre race where she came first. She rose to the occasion, ran for all she was worth and dived over the finish line passing the runners who were ahead of her earlier. Loads of fans congratulated her on having won the race as she held up the trophy. The race was the opportunity for all the world's best female runners to strut their stuff. It was truly memorable. After the concert I dined at a ramen restaurant nearby. I remember the table was sticky maybe because the staff forgot to wipe it up so I asked them to wipe it up. Later I spilled.a bowl of miso soup all over the floor so I had to wipe the spilt soup up. I had a friendly chat with a lady sitting at a nearby table who told me in centures past a whole village was wiped out by a catastrophic earthquake. Fascinating. When I finished my meal I wiped my mouth on my sleeve lol and tissues. There's an elegant cafe nearby of which the interior and the exterior are artistically and exquisitely designed. The other day my brother spilt his cappuccino all over his work and his shirt so he had to wipe up this mess. I enjoy drinking coffee and chatting with the baristas there so much that I sometimes make it worth their while.
